text: Youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu dou shuo:“Women shi an la zhizi, shi tasuo chong'ai de.” Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Na ta weisheme hai yaoyin nimen de zui'e er chengfa nimen ne?” Qishi, nimen yeshi tasuo chuangzao de fanren. Ta [an la] yu kuanshu shei, jiu kuanshu shei; yu chengfa shei, jiu chengfa shei. Tiandi wanwu de zhuquan dou shi an la de. Wei ta [an la] shi zuihou de guisu.
